member.name: T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyAgreeRecipientInfo

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyAgreeRecipientInfo" /> class defines key agreement recipient information. Key agreement algorithms typically use the Diffie-Hellman key agreement algorithm, in which the two parties that establish a shared cryptographic key both take part in its generation and, by definition, agree on that key. This is in contrast to key transport algorithms, in which one party generates the key unilaterally and sends, or transports it, to the other party.

member.summary: 類別會定義金鑰協議的收件者資訊。 「金鑰協議」(Key Agreement) 演算法通常都會使用 Diffie-Hellman 金鑰協議演算法，其中建立共用編譯密碼金鑰的雙方，都必須參與此金鑰的產生過程，等於雙方都認可這把金鑰。 相較之下，「金鑰傳輸」演算法只由單方面產生金鑰，然後再傳送或傳輸給另一方。

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyAgreeRecipientInfo.Date

member.summary: 屬性會擷取發行者開始進行金鑰協議通訊協定的日期和時間。

exception.vsli:raw: The recipient identifier type is not a subject key identifier.

member.exception: 收件者識別項型別不是主體金鑰識別項。

returns.vsli:raw: The date and time of the start of the key agreement protocol by the originator.

member.returns: 發行者開始進行金鑰協議通訊協定的日期和時間。

member.summary: 屬性會擷取經過加密的收件者金鑰設定資料。

returns.vsli:raw: An array of byte values that contain the encrypted recipient keying material.

member.returns: 位元組值的陣列，含有經過加密的收件者金鑰設定資料。

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyAgreeRecipientInfo.KeyEncryptionAlgorithm" /> property retrieves the algorithm used to perform the key agreement.

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyAgreeRecipientInfo.Version

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyAgreeRecipientInfo.Version" /> property retrieves the version of the key agreement recipient. member.summary: 屬性會擷取金鑰協議收件者的版本。 系統會針對此類別中的物件自動設定這個屬性，其設定值意味收件者有參與金鑰協議演算法的執行。

returns.vsli:raw: The version of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyAgreeRecipientInfo" /> object.

member.returns: 物件的版本。

member.name: T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyTransRecipientInfo

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyTransRecipientInfo" /> class defines key transport recipient information. Key transport algorithms typically use the RSA algorithm, in which an originator establishes a shared cryptographic key with a recipient by generating that key and then transporting it to the recipient. This is in contrast to key agreement algorithms, in which the two parties that will be using a cryptographic key both take part in its generation, thereby mutually agreeing to that key.

member.summary: 類別會定義金鑰傳輸的收件者資訊。 「金鑰傳輸」** 演算法通常會使用 RSA 演算法，其中建立者會產生金鑰並傳輸給收件者，以便雙方共用同一個密碼編譯金鑰。 相較之下，使用「金鑰協定」** 演算法時，共用同一個密碼編譯金鑰的雙方，都必須參與金鑰的產生過程，等於雙方都認可這把金鑰。

member.summary: 屬性會擷取金鑰傳輸收件者的加密金鑰。

returns.vsli:raw: An array of byte values that represents the encrypted key.

member.returns: 代表加密金鑰的位元組值陣列。

member.summary: 屬性會擷取要用來加密內容加密金鑰所使用的金鑰加密演算法。

returns.vsli:raw: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.AlgorithmIdentifier" /> object that stores the key encryption algorithm identifier.

member.returns: 儲存金鑰加密演算法識別碼的物件。

member.summary: 屬性會擷取與加密內容關聯的主體識別項。

member.returns: 物件，這個物件會儲存參與金鑰傳輸之收件者的識別碼。

The version of the key transport recipient is automatically set for objects in this class, and the value implies that the recipient is taking part in a key transport algorithm.

member.summary: 屬性會擷取金鑰傳輸收件者的版本。 系統會針對此類別中的物件自動設定金鑰傳輸收件者的版本，其值意味收件者有參與金鑰傳輸演算法。

A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime" /> object can be used as an authenticated attribute of a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> object when an authenticated date and time are to accompany a digital signature.

member.summary: 類別定義簽章的簽署日期與時間。 當數位簽章附有驗證日期和時間時， 物件可用為 物件的驗證屬性。

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.#ctor

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime" /> class.

member.summary: 建構函式會建立 類別的執行個體。

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.#ctor(System.Byte[])

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.#ctor(System.Byte[])" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime" /> class by using the specified array of byte values as the encoded signing date and time of the content of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.

member.summary: 建構函式會使用指定的位元組值陣列做為 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息內容的編碼簽章日期和時間，建立 類別的執行個體。

param.name: encodedSigningTime
param.vsli:raw: An array of byte values that specifies the encoded signing date and time of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

member.param: 位元組值陣列，指定 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的編碼簽章日期和時間。

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.#ctor(System.DateTime)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime" /> class by using the specified signing date and time.

member.summary: 建構函式會使用指定的簽章日期和時間，建立 類別的執行個體。

param.name: signingTime
param.vsli:raw: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> structure that represents the signing date and time of the signature.

member.param: 結構，表示簽章的簽署日期和時間。

param.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> object from which to copy information.

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9SigningTime.SigningTime" /> property retrieves a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> structure that represents the date and time that the message was signed.

member.summary: 屬性會擷取表示訊息之簽署日期和時間的 結構。

member.name: T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo" /> class represents information about a CMS/PKCS #7 message recipient. The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo" /> class is an abstract class inherited by the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyAgreeRecipientInfo" /> and <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.KeyTransRecipientInfo" /> classes.

member.summary: 類別表示 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息收件者的相關資訊。 類別是抽象類別 (Abstract Class)，由 和 類別繼承。

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo.EncryptedKey

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo.EncryptedKey" /> abstract property retrieves the encrypted recipient keying material.

member.summary: 抽象屬性會擷取經過加密的收件者金鑰設定資料。

returns.vsli:raw: An array of byte values that contain the encrypted recipient keying material.

member.returns: 位元組值的陣列，含有經過加密的收件者金鑰設定資料。

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo.KeyEncryptionAlgorithm

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo.KeyEncryptionAlgorithm" /> abstract property retrieves the algorithm used to perform the key establishment.

member.summary: 抽象屬性會擷取用來執行金鑰建立的演算法。

returns.vsli:raw: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.AlgorithmIdentifier" /> object that contains the value of the algorithm used to establish the key between the originator and recipient of the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

member.returns: 含有演算法的值的 物件，用來建立 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的發信者與收件者之間的金鑰時會使用這個演算法。

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo.RecipientIdentifier

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo.RecipientIdentifier" /> abstract property retrieves the identifier of the recipient.

member.summary: 抽象屬性會擷取收件者的識別項。

returns.vsli:raw: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifier" /> object that contains the identifier of the recipient.

member.returns: 含有收件者識別項的 物件。

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo.Type

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo.Type" /> property retrieves the type of the recipient. The type of the recipient determines which of two major protocols is used to establish a key between the originator and the recipient of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.

member.summary: 屬性會擷取收件者的類型。 建立 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息發出者與收件者之間的金鑰時，究竟要使用兩種主要通訊協定中的哪一種，由收件者的類型決定。

returns.vsli:raw: A value of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoType" /> enumeration that defines the type of the recipient.

member.returns: 列舉的其中一個值，定義收件者的類型。

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo.Version

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo.Version" /> abstract property retrieves the version of the recipient information. Derived classes automatically set this property for their objects, and the value indicates whether it is using PKCS #7 or Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) to protect messages. The version also implies whether the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo" /> object establishes a cryptographic key by a key agreement algorithm or a key transport algorithm.

member.summary: 抽象屬性會擷取收件者資訊的版本。 衍生類別 (Derived Class) 會自動為它們的物件設定這個屬性，而且由這個值可以看出保護訊息所使用的是 PKCS #7 或 CMS (Cryptographic Message Syntax，密碼編譯訊息語法)。 由版本亦可推敲出 物件建立密碼編譯金鑰時，是採用金鑰協議演算法或金鑰傳輸演算法。

returns.vsli:raw: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the version of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo" /> object.

member.returns: 代表 物件版本的 值。

member.name: T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Rfc3161TimestampRequest

summary.vsli:raw: Represents a time-stamping request from IETF RFC 3161.

member.summary: 表示來自 IETF RFC 3161 的時間戳記要求。

summary.vsli:raw: Creates a timestamp request by hashing the provided data with a specified algorithm.

member.summary: 使用所指定演算法來雜湊提供的資料，以建立時間戳記要求。

param.name: data
param.vsli:raw: The data to timestamp, which will be hashed by this method.

member.param: 要由這個方法雜湊的資料時間戳記。

param.name: hashAlgorithm
param.vsli:raw: The hash algorithm to use with this timestamp request.

member.param: 要與此時間戳記要求搭配使用的雜湊演算法。

param.name: requestedPolicyId
param.vsli:raw: The Object Identifier (OID) for a timestamp policy the Timestamp Authority (TSA) should use, or <see langword="null" /> to express no preference.

member.param: 時間戳記授權單位 (TSA) 應該使用之時間戳記原則的物件識別碼 (OID)，或使用 表示沒有偏好。

param.name: nonce
param.vsli:raw: An optional nonce (number used once) to uniquely identify this request to pair it with the response. The value is interpreted as an unsigned big-endian integer and may be normalized to the encoding format.

member.param: 唯一識別此要求以將它與回應配對的選擇性 nonce (使用一次的數字)。 值會被解譯為不帶正負號的位元組由大到小，而且可能會被正規化為編碼格式。

param.name: requestSignerCertificates
param.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the Timestamp Authority (TSA) must include the signing certificate in the issued timestamp token; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

member.param: 以指出時間戳記授權單位 (TSA) 必須在簽發的時間戳記權杖包括簽署憑證；否則為 。

param.name: extensions
param.vsli:raw: An optional collection of extensions to include in the request.

member.param: 要包含在要求中的選用延伸模組集合。

exception.vsli:raw: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" /> is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.

member.exception: . 為 或 。

exception.vsli:raw: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" /> is not a known hash algorithm.

member.exception: 不是已知的雜湊演算法。

returns.vsli:raw: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Rfc3161TimestampRequest" /> representing the chosen values.

param.name: signerInfo
param.vsli:raw: The CMS signer information to verify the timestamp was built for.

member.param: 要確認針對其建置時間戳記的 CMS 簽署者資訊。

param.name: signerCertificate
param.vsli:raw: When this method returns, the certificate from the Timestamp Authority (TSA) that signed this token, or <see langword="null" /> if a signer certificate cannot be determined. This parameter is treated as uninitialized.

member.param: 當此方法傳回時，則為簽署此權杖的時間戳記授權 (TSA) 中憑證；如果無法判斷簽署者憑證，則為 。 這個參數會被視為未初始化。

param.name: extraCandidates
param.vsli:raw: An optional collection of certificates to consider as the Timestamp Authority (TSA) certificates, in addition to any certificates that may be included within the token.

member.param: 除了權杖中可能包含的任何憑證之外，另有一個選擇性的憑證集合可視為時間戳記授權 (TSA) 憑證。

exception.vsli:raw: <paramref name="signerInfo" /> is <see langword="null" />.

member.exception: 為 。

returns.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> if the Timestamp Authority (TSA) certificate was found, the certificate public key validates the token signature, and the token matches the signature for <paramref name="signerInfo" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

member.returns: 如果找到時間戳記授權 (TSA) 憑證，憑證公開金鑰即會驗證權杖簽章，且該權杖符合 的簽章，則為 ；否則為 。

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Rfc3161TimestampToken.TokenInfo

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the details of this time-stamp token as a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Rfc3161TimestampTokenInfo" />.

member.summary: 以 形式取得此時間戳記權杖的詳細資料。

returns.vsli:raw: The details of this time-stamp token as a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Rfc3161TimestampTokenInfo" />.

member.returns: 這個時間戳記權杖的詳細資料，做為 。

param.name: policyId
param.vsli:raw: An OID representing the TSA's policy under which the response was produced.

param.name: hashAlgorithmId
param.vsli:raw: A hash algorithm OID of the data to be timestamped.

param.name: messageHash
param.vsli:raw: A hash value of the data to be timestamped.

param.name: serialNumber
param.vsli:raw: An integer assigned by the TSA to the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Rfc3161TimestampTokenInfo" />.

param.name: timestamp
param.vsli:raw: The timestamp encoded in the token.

param.name: accuracyInMicroseconds
param.vsli:raw: The accuracy with which <paramref name="timestamp" /> is compared. Also see <paramref name="isOrdering" />.

param.name: isOrdering
param.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> to ensure that every timestamp token from the same TSA can always be ordered based on the <paramref name="timestamp" />, regardless of the accuracy; <see langword="false" /> to make <paramref name="timestamp" /> indicate when token has been created by the TSA.

param.name: nonce
param.vsli:raw: The nonce associated with this timestamp token. Using a nonce always allows to detect replays, and hence its use is recommended.

param.name: timestampAuthorityName
param.vsli:raw: The hint in the TSA name identification. The actual identification of the entity that signed the response will always occur through the use of the certificate identifier.

param.name: extensions
param.vsli:raw: The extension values associated with the timestamp.

param.name: encodedBytes
param.vsli:raw: The input or source buffer.

param.name: timestampTokenInfo
param.vsli:raw: When this method returns <see langword="true" />, the decoded data. When this method returns <see langword="false" />, the value is <see langword="null" />, meaning the data could not be decoded.

param.name: bytesConsumed
param.vsli:raw: The number of bytes used for decoding.

param.name: destination
param.vsli:raw: The destination buffer.

param.name: bytesWritten
param.vsli:raw: When this method returns <see langword="true" />, contains the bytes written to the <paramref name="destination" /> buffer.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckHash

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckHash" /> method verifies the data integrity of the CMS/PKCS #7 message. <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckHash" /> is a specialized method used in specific security infrastructure applications that only wish to check the hash of the CMS message, rather than perform a full digital signature verification. <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckHash" /> does not authenticate the author nor sender of the message because this method does not involve verifying a digital signature. For general-purpose checking of the integrity and authenticity of a CMS/PKCS #7 message, use the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckSignature(System.Boolean)" /> or <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckSignature(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection,System.Boolean)" /> methods.

member.summary: 方法會驗證 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的資料完整性。 是用於只想檢查 CMS 郵件雜湊而不想執行完整數位簽章驗證之特定安全性基礎架構應用程式的特殊方法。 不會驗證訊息的作者或寄件人，因為這個方法未涉及驗證數位簽章。 如需為一般目的而檢查 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息的完整性和真實性，請使用 或 方法。

exception.vsli:raw: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.

member.exception: 物件目前狀態的方法呼叫無效。

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckSignature(System.Boolean)

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignedCms.CheckSignature(System.Boolean)" /> method verifies the digital signatures on the signed CMS/PKCS #7 message and, optionally, validates the signers' certificates.

member.summary: 方法會驗證已簽署之 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息上的數位簽章，而且可以選擇性地驗證簽署人的憑證。

param.name: verifySignatureOnly
param.vsli:raw:
A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether only the digital signatures are verified without the signers' certificates being validated.
If <paramref name="verifySignatureOnly" /> is <see langword="true" />, only the digital signatures are verified. If it is <see langword="false" />, the digital signatures are verified, the signers' certificates are validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated. The purposes of a certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation.

member.param:
值，指定是否只驗證數位簽章，而不驗證簽署人的憑證。
如果 為 ，則只驗證數位簽章。 如果為 ，則會驗證數位簽章、簽署人的憑證及憑證的目的。 如果憑證沒有金鑰使用方式，或金鑰使用方式支援數位簽章或不可否認性，憑證的目的可視為有效。

exception.vsli:raw: A null reference was passed to a method that does not accept it as a valid argument.

member.exception: Null 參考已傳遞至不接受它做為有效引數的方法。

exception.vsli:raw: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.

member.exception: 密碼編譯作業無法完成。

exception.vsli:raw: A method call was invalid for the object's current state.

member.exception: 物件目前狀態的方法呼叫無效。

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckHash

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckHash" /> method verifies the data integrity of the CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information. <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckHash" /> is a specialized method used in specific security infrastructure applications in which the subject uses the HashOnly member of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SubjectIdentifierType" /> enumeration when setting up a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner" /> object. <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckHash" /> does not authenticate the signer information because this method does not involve verifying a digital signature. For general-purpose checking of the integrity and authenticity of CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information and countersignatures, use the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckSignature(System.Boolean)" /> or <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckSignature(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection,System.Boolean)" /> methods.

member.summary: 方法會驗證 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息簽署人資訊的資料完整性。 是特定安全性基礎結構應用程式中會使用的特定方法，在這種應用程式中，主體會在設定 物件時使用 列舉的 HashOnly 成員。 不會驗證簽署人資訊，因為這個方法並不涉及確認數位簽章。 如需為一般目的而檢查 CMS/PKCS #7 訊息簽署人資訊和副署的完整性和驗證性 (Authenticity)，請使用 或 方法。

exception.vsli:raw: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.

member.exception: 密碼編譯作業無法完成。

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckSignature(System.Boolean)

summary.vsli:raw: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.CheckSignature(System.Boolean)" /> method verifies the digital signature of the message and, optionally, validates the certificate.

member.summary: 方法會驗證 (Verify) 訊息的數位簽章，也可以選擇性地驗證 (Validate) 憑證。

param.name: verifySignatureOnly
param.vsli:raw: A bool value that specifies whether only the digital signature is verified. If <paramref name="verifySignatureOnly" /> is <see langword="true" />, only the signature is verified. If <paramref name="verifySignatureOnly" /> is <see langword="false" />, the digital signature is verified, the certificate chain is validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated. The purposes of the certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signature or nonrepudiation.

member.param: bool 值，指定是否僅驗證 (Verify) 數位簽章。 如果 為 ，只驗證 (Verify) 簽章。 如果 為 ，則驗證 (Verify) 數位簽章、驗證 (Validate) 憑證鏈結和驗證 (Validate) 憑證的目的。 如果憑證沒有金鑰使用方式，或金鑰使用方式支援數位簽章或不可否認性 (Nonrepudiation)，憑證的目的可視為有效。

member.summary: 方法使用指定的憑證集合來驗證 (Verify) 訊息的數位簽章，也可以選擇性地驗證 (Validate) 憑證。
